pkgmetadata.longdescription: Expected Maximum Profit Classification Performance Measure // Functions for estimating EMP (Expected Maximum Profit Measure) in Credit Risk Scoring and Customer Churn Prediction, according to Verbraken et al (2013, 2014) DOI:10.1109/TKDE.2012.50, DOI:10.1016/j.ejor.2014.04.001.
